name: Young Silver Dragon
description: A Young Silver Dragon has metallic silver scales that gleam in sunlight, embodying grace and majesty. It has a powerful presence with a strong, well-built physique, large wings, and a notable tail.
memorable: A Young Silver Dragon combines its impressive physical abilities with magical prowess. It is known for its icy breath attack and ability to paralyze foes, while also being a noble protector of the innocent.
goals: Protect nearby settlements from evil forces, provide guidance to mortals, avoid conflict when possible.
relations: Commonly allies with good-aligned creatures and serves as a guardian.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage, high AC, and significant hit points make it tough to defeat.
weaknesses: Lower Wisdom may affect its perception and insight abilities.
attacks: Multiattack with a bite and two claws, dealing piercing and slashing damage, supplemented by cold damage from its Breath Weapons.
most_powerful_ability: Frost Breath that deals high cold damage in a wide cone and can severely impact multiple foes at once.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without sight.
skills: Proficient in Arcana and History, showcasing its knowledge of magical and historical lore.
additional_information: Can cast spells like charm person and faerie fire innately.
Cloud Strider ability allows it to thrive at high altitudes.
Change Shape ability grants versatility in form and tactics.
spellcasting: Innate casting of charm person and faerie fire with Charisma as the spellcasting ability.
test_queries: young dragon with freezing cloud abilities
large silver dragon in cold mountains
